item.title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
item.description: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from alleged Dec. 2 incident.

item.title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
item.description: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.
